SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Analyzer
Implements the logic to deduce the optimal strategy for the given game history and analyzes and saves relevant information from the previous round.
Attack
Abstract class that represents an aggressive strategy that attacks opponent nodes.
AttackMax
Represents a strategy that attacks the nodes with the highest fernie counts.
AttackMin
Represents a strategy that attacks the nodes with the lowest fernie counts.
Consolidation
Represents a strategy that fortifies the nodes closest to the opponent's nodes.
Defensive
Represents a defensive strategy that tries to elude the opponent's attacks.
EmptyMove
Is used when the step file is invalid and an empty move file should be created.
Expansion
Represents an expansive strategy that tries to occupy as many nodes as possible.
FallBack
Represents a fallback strategy for when other strategies have produced invalid results.
FernieException
Thrown when the agent tries to place more fernies on a node than is allowed by the max fernie count per node.
InvalidStatusException
Thrown when the status file of a given step is not valid.
MixedStrategy
Represents a mixed strategy that combines elements of different basic strategies.
MoveException
Thrown if a given move is invalid.
Node
Represents a node on the ring.
Notes
Represents the notes that the agents creates during the game and which it accesses during each round to determine its behavior.
Output
Represents the output (to be written in the move file) that the agent generates.
Owner
Represents the ownership status of a node.
Ring
Represents the current status of the playing field and associated informations.
RINGwars_8878390_Koebke_Vanessa
Main class that starts the program and calls upon the various other program components.
Strategy
Abstract class, which declares the methods that are common to all strategies and some utility methods (static).
StrategyOpponent
Represents the strategy of the opponent in terms of the level of aggressiveness and defensiveness.
Tracker
Helps track the success of different strategies by counting the wins and losses.
Util
Utility class with static methods for reading and writing files.
